channel.title: svelte on Massimo Meert

item.title: guessera
item.description: A interactive 3D geography game for kids to have fun while learning countries. Built for a hackaton with Cyrus. Read more about it here.

item.title: elle-et-moi
item.description: elle-et-moi is an inventory management software built for the eponymous clothes store. Some of the interesting features implemented: QR code scanning, product trend reporting, low stock notifications, profit and loss reporting. This app was made for one of my client and is therefore private, but if you want to have a peek at it feel free to contact me!
